name: part_008
file: tmp_【#わための誕生日2021】３Ｄお誕生日パーティー！！！【角巻わため⧸ホロライブ４期生】 [UHLdoq-T-mA]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_008.mov

scenes.description: Tsunomaki Watame performs the song 'Yomosugara Kimi Omou'.
Watame talks to the audience, apologizes for messing up the lyrics, and takes a water break.

subtitles.original: ...傷つけ合ってまた 愛し合うのさ
subtitles.english: ...hurt each other and then love each other again.

subtitles.original: 結婚や仕事のトークに またちょっと疲れてたとしても
subtitles.english: Even if you're a bit tired of talk about marriage or work,

subtitles.original: そう僕も他人事なんかじゃない 分かってるのさ
subtitles.english: Yeah, it's not someone else's business to me either, I know that.

subtitles.original: 明けない夜はないと 夜明け前がただ暗いと
subtitles.english: That there's no night that doesn't end, that it's just dark before dawn.

subtitles.original: この先に待つ明日が そんなに輝くもんかな
subtitles.english: I wonder if the tomorrow waiting ahead will really shine that much.

subtitles.original: 今 I Love You で始まる僕らを もっと照らしてくれよ
subtitles.english: Now, shine more light on us who start with 'I Love You'.

subtitles.original: 変わらない愛や希望の類も まだ信じてみたいのさ
subtitles.english: I still want to believe in things like unchanging love and hope.

subtitles.original: ほら I Miss You で諦めモードでも OK 飛ばしていけよ
subtitles.english: Look, even if it's 'I Miss You' and resignation mode, it's OK, keep going.

subtitles.original: 時代が食らい未来が待ち受けど 愛を歌おう
subtitles.english: Though the times are harsh and the future awaits, let's sing of love.

subtitles.original: みんな楽しんでってな！
subtitles.english: Everyone, have fun!

subtitles.original: アボカドのトロに足ることで いつも悩んだりしてるのは
subtitles.english: The reason I'm always worrying about it being like fatty tuna or avocado...

subtitles.original: 言っちゃえばアダムとイブからも 決まってたのさ
subtitles.english: If I say so, it was decided since Adam and Eve.

subtitles.original: なんとなく恋に落ちて いつの間にか本気だって
subtitles.english: Somehow falling in love, and before I knew it, I was serious.

subtitles.original: 張り裂けそうな胸の奥は 打ち明けなくちゃな
subtitles.english: I have to confess what's deep in my bursting heart.

subtitles.original: 今 I Love You で始まる僕らを もっと照らしてくれよ
subtitles.english: Now, shine more light on us who start with 'I Love You'.

subtitles.original: イメージ通りに運ばぬとしても 信じてみたいのさ
subtitles.english: Even if things don't go as imagined, I want to try believing.

subtitles.original: ほら I Miss You って賞味期限がある Oh Yes 急かしてくれよ
subtitles.english: Look, 'I Miss You' has an expiration date, Oh Yes, hurry me up.

subtitles.original: 時代が食らい未来が待ち受けど 愛を歌おう
subtitles.english: Though the times are harsh and the future awaits, let's sing of love.

subtitles.original: あとさ夜明けまで 君の声が聞きたい Oh Yeah
subtitles.english: And also, until dawn, I want to hear your voice, Oh Yeah.

subtitles.original: 愛いつも変わり映えしなくてさ
subtitles.english: Love always stays the same...

subtitles.original: 僕ら同じことで悩んだり 悲しんだり 笑ったりしてるのにな
subtitles.english: Even though we worry, grieve, and laugh about the same things.

subtitles.original: 分かり合うのはそう簡単じゃない
subtitles.english: Understanding each other isn't that easy.

subtitles.original: ただこんなにも君とリンクしてる 重なっていく
subtitles.english: But I'm linking with you this much, overlapping.

subtitles.original: 今 I Love You で始まる僕らを もっと照らしてくれよ
subtitles.english: Now, shine more light on us who start with 'I Love You'.

subtitles.original: 変わらない愛や希望の類も まだ信じてみたいのさ
subtitles.english: I still want to believe in things like unchanging love and hope.

subtitles.original: ほら I Miss You で諦めモードでも OK 飛ばしていけよ
subtitles.english: Look, even if it's 'I Miss You' and resignation mode, it's OK, keep going.

subtitles.original: 時代が食らい未来が待ち受けど 愛を歌おう
subtitles.english: Though the times are harsh and the future awaits, let's sing of love.

subtitles.original: 僕が生まれる前よりも ずっと昔から続くように そういつも傷つけ合ってまた 愛し合うのさ
subtitles.english: As if continuing from long before I was born, hurting each other and loving each other again.

subtitles.original: センキュー！いかーん。
subtitles.english: Thank you! Oh no...

subtitles.original: 歌詞間違えた！すみませんでした！
subtitles.english: I messed up the lyrics! I'm so sorry!

subtitles.original: うわぁ、やっちまったやっちまった、大変だ大変だ大変だ。
subtitles.english: Waaah, I blew it, I blew it. This is bad, this is bad...

subtitles.original: 大変だ、やっちゃったよ、おいおいおい。
subtitles.english: It's bad, I did it. Hey, hey, hey.

subtitles.original: すみませんでした、でも最高に楽しい！
subtitles.english: I'm sorry, but this is so much fun!

subtitles.original: バレへんバレへん、あーって途中で思ったけど、
subtitles.english: They won't notice, they won't notice. I thought 'Ah!' in the middle,

subtitles.original: ちょっとあの、ごまかしてみました。
subtitles.english: But I, uh, tried to play it off.

subtitles.original: すみませんでした本当に、申し訳ない。
subtitles.english: I'm really sorry, my apologies.

subtitles.original: 次の曲、まだあるので。
subtitles.english: There's still the next song.

subtitles.original: ちょっとその前に、水とか飲んでもいいかな？
subtitles.english: Before that, can I drink some water?

subtitles.original: もーらお、飲んでもいいかな、いい？
subtitles.english: I'll take some. Can I drink? Is it okay?

subtitles.original: あぁー。
subtitles.english: Ahhh.

subtitles.original: うまっ！
subtitles.english: Good!

subtitles.original: 水がうめんじゃ、生命の源なんじゃ。
subtitles.english: The water is so good. It's the source of life.

subtitles.original: ありがとね。いや、やっぱ緊張するね。
subtitles.english: Thank you. Man, I really am nervous.

subtitles.original: では、早く告知も聞きたいと思うので、
subtitles.english: Now, I'm sure you want to hear the announcement soon,

subtitles.original: 次の曲、行ってもいいですか！？
subtitles.english: So, can we go to the next song!?

subtitles.original: 行ってもいいですか！？
subtitles.english: Can we go!?

subtitles.original: 準備はいいですか！？
subtitles.english: Are you ready!?
